name: MLAATR SPACE INVASION
description:
Theres a Alien invasion coming from space! Its the Cluster! Jenny cant face them alone, she'll need help, with her sisters of course! Play as Jenny, XJ6, XJ8 or XJ7 in this test of a minigame thats a basic recreation of the arcade classic space invaders. 

A and D controls to go left and right, and hold X to fire.
